flows.name: Basic Text Post Creation
flows.description: Create and publish a simple text-only post to social media channels
prerequisites: User has access to Publish module
At least one connected social media channel

steps.details: Click on Publish in the main navigation
Select 'Create post' button in the upper left corner
Choose target social media channels from the channel selector
Type post content in the text editor, respecting character limits per network
Apply organizational labels for content categorization
Configure UTM parameters and link shortening if needed
Select 'Publish now', 'Schedule', or 'Send for approval'

decision_points.criteria: Based on content strategy and organizational approval requirements

outcomes: Post is published immediately to selected channels
Post is scheduled for future publication
Post is sent to designated approvers
citations: Source: Publish/Creating Posts/Creating a text post.pdf

flows.name: Image Post Creation

steps.action: Navigate to Publish and click 'Create post'
steps.details: Access the post creation interface
Choose destination social media platforms
Drag and drop or browse to select image files
Provide accessibility descriptions for images
Add accompanying text content
Adjust image positioning, tagging, and platform-specific options
Add organizational labels and configure UTM tracking
Publish, schedule, or send for approval

decision_points.criteria: Based on target network requirements
Content strategy and network-specific best practices

outcomes: Images published with proper formatting per network
Alt text applied for accessibility compliance
citations: Source: Publish/Creating Posts/Creating an image or GIF post.pdf

flows.name: Video Post Creation

Upload caption files or add manual captions
Set video type (Feed, Reel, Story), aspect ratio, and quality
Add compelling caption and relevant hashtags
Choose immediate, scheduled, or approval workflow

decision_points.criteria: Content type, audience engagement strategy, platform best practices

flows.name: Instagram Carousel Post Creation
flows.description: Create multi-image carousel posts for Instagram with proper sequencing
prerequisites: User has access to Publish module

steps.details: Navigate to Publish > Create post > Select Instagram
Choose carousel option from post type selector
Select 2-10 images for the carousel sequence
Drag and drop to sequence images in desired order

steps.action: Add alt text for each image
steps.details: Provide accessibility descriptions for all carousel images
Create engaging caption that references the carousel content
Include relevant hashtags and user/location tags
Review how the carousel will appear to users
Choose immediate publishing or scheduling

decision_points.criteria: Content goals and audience engagement strategy
Visual consistency and Instagram best practices

outcomes: Enhanced user engagement through swipeable content

flows.name: Emergency Content Unscheduling

Filter by team, channel, or other criteria if needed
Use 'Select all' checkbox to choose all filtered posts
Click three-dot menu for bulk actions

Upload images, videos, or resource files (up to 1GB per video, 25MB per image)
Include captions, copy, or descriptive text

Add organizational labels for categorization
Include usage instructions or context for team
Finalize stock creation and make available to team

Content sensitivity and usage requirements

outcomes: Team access to shared content library
